name: hardhat-project

scripts.hardhat-deploy: SET NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && npx hardhat run ./scripts/deploy.js --network localhost
scripts.hardhat-console: SET NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && npx hardhat console --network localhost

description: This project demonstrates a basic Hardhat use case. It comes with a sample contract, a test for that contract, and a script that deploys that contract.
